about_the_game:
About the game

An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high definition graphics and videos, with realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a smoking hot doctor who has sex with three sexy women inside his private practice.

Game description

New day - New babe. Isn’t that what they say?
For some people this might be a dream, but luckily, we have just the right game to turn your fantasy into reality.

Enter the world of Sex Simulator - Dirty Doctor, and step into the shoes of a hot and kinky doctor who loves to bend the rules and seduce his very sexy patients, in the privacy of his own practice.

Choose between 3 different girls with 3 different personalities.
Flirt, seduce, and convince each one of them to spread their legs and get mess with you. Make them come and scream your name in pleasure, so they will return to your practice for more dirty physical exams.

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker, we got this part covered for you.
All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the ladies come before you run out of stamina.
Choose between 3 types of sex and positions to satisfy the girls, and feel free to swap between the various camera angles we set up for you so that you won’t miss any of the hot details happening on screen.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well…it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until you leave the girls satisfied.

Features

90+ HD quality renders
27 HD animations

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual intercourse between male and female characters. Nude characters. Sexual language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
